law.catch_line: Restriction on placement of nonoffender or curfew violator.
law.text:
The following persons shall not be detained in a secure juvenile detention facility:
A nonoffender; or
Any child charged with a violation of a statute or local ordinance pertaining to curfew.
law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 132, sec. 44, effective July 1, 2015. -- Created 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 87, sec. 2, effective July 15, 2008.
